projects.title: Aitomic Fitness App
projects.bodyText:
---
 - A cutting-edge **Fitness** app built with **Flutter** and **Firebase**.
 - Utilizes AI to generate personalized **Workout and Meal Plans** tailored to individual fitness goals.
 - Designed with an intuitive interface for easy navigation and real-time updates on workouts and meal plans.
 - Perfect for fitness enthusiasts seeking a comprehensive and dynamic approach to their health journey.

projects.title: NeaterNotes App
projects.bodyText:
---
- An advanced **Notes App** built using **Flutter** and **Firebase**.
 - Scans notes and images, converting them into editable notes that resemble handwritten text.
 - Allows users to customize notes and share them as PDFs.
 - Automatic stores new notes in the most relevant notebook and remembers transcription corrections to improve accuracy.

projects.title: University LMS App
projects.bodyText:
---
 - A role-based **LMS** built with **Flutter**, **Firebase**, and **Node.js** for Admins, Teachers, and Students.
 - Key features include **Smart Notifications**, **Relative Grading System**, **Chatbot for FAQs**, and real-time updates.
 - **Admins** manage users, courses, timetables, reports, and events.
 - **Teachers** handle materials, assignments, grades, attendance, and student queries.
 - **Students** access dashboards, view progress, and stay updated.
 - Built with **Clean Architecture** and **GetX** for structured, scalable development.

projects.title: Drivers App
projects.bodyText:
---
- An advanced **Driver Monitoring App** developed using **Flutter** and **Firebase**.
 - Tracks driving time, breaks, off-duty periods, and on-duty status.
 - Stores historical driving data and provides notifications for upcoming breaks or off-duty times.
 - Supports both **Light** and **Dark** mode for enhanced user experience. 
 - Utilizes **Firebase** for real-time data synchronization and user management.

projects.title: Construct and Connect App
projects.bodyText:
---
- A **Management App** developed using **Flutter** and **Firebase** for the construction industry.
 - Manages ongoing construction projects and teams working on these projects.
 - Facilitates team communication and task assignments within the app.
 - Utilizes **Firebase Firestore** for real-time data updates and user management.

projects.title: ShopVista App
projects.bodyText:
---
- A **Shopping App** built with **Flutter** and **Firebase**.
 - Includes an **Admin Panel** for managing products and users.
 - Features a **Customer Panel** where users can browse, purchase products, and add them to the cart.
 - Provides a seamless shopping experience with real-time updates and user management through **Firebase**.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.bodyText:
---
- An Android App developed using **Java** for **Up-to-Date** Weather Information.
 - Fetches Weather Data from an **API**.
 - Provides Weather information for the **Current Location**.
 - Allows to **Search** Weather of any City.
 - Displays **Weather Details** such as Temp, Weather Conditions, Humidity and Wind Speed.
 - Offers an **Hourly Weather Forecast** for the next 5 days.

projects.title: Currency Converter App
projects.bodyText:
---
- User-friendly Android App for Real-Time **Currency Conversion**.
 - Utilizes **Retrofit** for API integration.
 - Fetches **Up-to-Date** Currency Rates when **Internet is Available**.
- Offers **Offline** support, ensuring functionality without an **Internet Connection**.
- Utilizes **Room Database** for efficient **Data Storage**.
- Follows the **MVVM** Architectural pattern for organized code.

projects.title: Academic System App
projects.bodyText:
---
- Developed in **Java**, the Academic System App is designed to streamline **Academic Data Management**.
 - Efficiently stores essential **Student information** including Class details, Test scores, Attendance records, and Fee records.
- Utilizes the power of the **Room Database** to securely store and retrieve Student data.
- Simplifies the administrative tasks of **Educational Institutions** by centralizing Students records.
